ul.li: Associating the Data Processing Function that will process the data collection

conbody.p: Connection information to specific systems is not a part of data collection configuration. Data is "pushed" from the site submitting the data. extracts any necessary connection information and login credentials from the session information.

p.xref: How do I submit data to ?

conbody.p: Data collection configuration is set on the Data Collections page. The Data Collections page also includes a facility for manually ingesting data.
